# Golemancer SOP This is the list of procedures, responsibilities, and duties of the [color=#cc74fc]Golemancer[/color] of this station. For clarification, 'Researcher' and 'Golemancer' are both referred to as 'Researcher' in this SOP.
## Green Alert 1. The Researcher is not permitted to construct any Combat Mechs without express permission from the Captain and/or Head of Security. The [color=#1b67a5][bold]Research Director[/bold][/color] is placed under these same restrictions.
2. The Researcher is freely permitted to construct Utility Mechs, along with Utility Equipment. This refers to Ripleys.
3. The Researcher is freely permitted to construct Cyborgs and all assorted equipment (modules and more).
4. The Researcher is not permitted to transfer personnel MMIs into Cyborgs without express written or verbal consent from the person in question. The consent form should be kept safe.
## Blue Alert 1. Guidelines 2, 3, and 4 carry over from [color=#388c34]Green Alert[/color].
2. The Researcher is permitted to construct Combat Mechs, but [bold]must deliver them to Armory[/bold] for Storage. Failure to do so will result in the Combat Mech being destroyed. The only exception to this policy is for extreme emergencies, such as Delta Alert, Nuclear Operatives, Blob, et cetera. The [color=#1b67a5][bold]Research Director[/bold][/color] is placed under these same restrictions.
## Red Alert 1. All guidelines from [color=#388c34]Green Alert[/color] and [color=#1b67a5]Blue Alert[/color] carry over. No special guidelines in [color=#ba292c]Red Alert[/color].
## White Alert 1. The Researcher is to leave the Epistemics Department and assist the Mantis, Mystagogue, and other Epistemics personnel in finding psionic users and lowering the glimmer levels.
2. The Researcher is to ensure that no other personnel are in the Epistemics area in case of a glimmer overload resulting in an explosion in the Epistemics area.
3. The Researcher is to take commands from the Mystagogue and Mantis during this time.
